comment: Took him online. You had a good deal of writing assignments but to me it wasn't to a point where you can't handle it. The last assignment (final) is a group project and so long as everyone participates you'll be fine. He's very understanding and is quick to respond to any e-mails you send him.

Online class. A lot of assignments here an there. Weekly discussions, reply to students, etc. Two tests, multiple choice, fill in the blank and short answer. Group Project. Couple of short video assignments (the first and last discussion board). Do the work, you'll get an A.
